relics.name: Load the Cannons
relics.description: At the start of each combat, and then every 4 turns, add a Cannonball into your hand.

relics.name: Cannonballs of Steel
relics.description: Your Cannonballs deal 2 more damage. (Works with every type of Cannonball.)

relics.name: Hip Flask
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 blackbeard:Resistance.

relics.name: Spearhead
relics.description: When a blackbeard:Weapon has 1 Durability, it deals 3 more damage.
relics.flavorText: The durability of your Weapon ends... and so does the life of your enemy.

relics.name: Treasure Chest
relics.flavorText: This treasure chest contains untold riches.

relics.name: White Pearl
relics.description: Whenever you equip a blackbeard:Weapon, give it +1 Attack.

relics.name: Penknife
relics.description: Every 8th Attack that uses at least one blackbeard:Weapon deals double damage.
relics.flavorText: If you have it in your pocket, don't forget to use it.

relics.name: Powder Can
relics.description: At the start of each combat, equip a 0 / 1 blackbeard:Weapon. When it is destroyed, deal 8 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Just like a Powder Keg, but smaller.

relics.name: Magical Cauldron
relics.description: At the end of each combat, obtain a random potion.

relics.name: Poor Math Skills
relics.description: You think that you have gained 500 more Gold this run than you actually did. (It matters for cards that scale with Gold gained this run.)
relics.flavorText: Sometimes failing a math class is a good thing.

relics.name: Karategi
relics.description: Your blackbeard:Weapons have infinite Durability. After you attack with a blackbeard:Weapon, it goes to the last position.
relics.flavorText: When you wear it, you instantly learn new styles of combat.

relics.name: Load the Golden Cannons
relics.description: Replaces Load the Cannons. At the start of each combat, and then every 4 turns, add a Golden Cannonball into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Is it even worth to shoot all these golden cannonballs?!?

relics.name: Sober-minded
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of each combat, and then every 6 turns, lose 1 blackbeard:Resistance.
relics.flavorText: Being sober is not a natural state for The Blackbeard.

relics.name: Blood Orange
relics.description: Whenever you play 6 cards in the same turn, remove all of your debuffs.
relics.flavorText: This citrus seems to have an interesting power.

relics.name: Crossed Swords
relics.description: Your attacks use an additional blackbeard:Weapon.

potions.name: Orange Juice
potions.description: Heal 8 HP. Remove all of your debuffs.

keywords.name: Bleed
keywords.description: Bleeding creatures lose HP at the start of their turn.

keywords.name: Reaper's Mark
keywords.description: Whenever 3 stacks are applied, they are removed and the creature loses HP equal to 40% of its missing HP.

keywords.name: Resistance
keywords.description: You take less damage from enemy attacks. (Enemy intents always show actual incoming damage, with Resistance taken into account.) Resistance can be negative.

keywords.name: Rusty Thorns
keywords.description: When attacked, deals damage back and reduces Rusty Thorns by 1.

keywords.name: Weapon
keywords.description: Whenever you play an attack card, one Durability of your rightmost Weapon is used and card's damage is increased by Weapon's Attack. You can equip a maximum of 10 Weapons.
